record.title: PERMISSION FOR MEMBER TO BE CONSIDERED AS FIRST SPONSOR OF H.R. 2472
record.narrative:
PERMISSION FOR MEMBER TO BE CONSIDERED AS FIRST SPONSOR OF H.R. 2472 -- (House of Representatives - June 17, 2008)

[Page: H5459]

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that I may hereafter be considered to be the first sponsor of H.R. 2472, a bill originally introduced by Representative Wynn of Maryland, for the purposes of adding cosponsors and requesting reprintings pursuant to clause 7 of rule XII.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from New York?
